name: @bricksandbraces/arcade-tokens
description: Awesome design tokens for the Bricks & Braces brand.

scripts.tokens:format:fix: DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint --fix --cache --cache-strategy content . && prettier --write . && rimraf node_modules
scripts.tokens:build: yarn tokens:clean && tsc --build --verbose && cp -R pcss/ dist/ && echo 'Build complete!'
scripts.tokens:run-update: yarn tokens:generate-from-figma && yarn tokens:build && echo 'Update complete!'

author: moin@bricksandbraces.com
